Description: Charge <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">15m</font> and deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.200000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage when you reach a target. Press basic attack to stop charging and attack early. \n\nThis ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">grit</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Charge now deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.200000 * 100]}% / {[1.300000 * 100]}% / {[1.400000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img> weapon damage based on time spent charging.

During Charge you may press block to execute a swing attack, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.400000 * 100]}% / {[1.500000 * 100]}% / {[1.650000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage based on time spent charging.

Extend your axe <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">5m</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">pulling</font> foes to you and dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.800000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">staggering</font> struck foes. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your great axe, this ability inflicts taunt for {[4.000000]}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>
Reap range is now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">8m</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">Heal</font> yourself for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.300000 * 100]}%</font> of damage done by Reap.

After pulling, perform a spin attack dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.150000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage.

A powerful overhead attack dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[2.000000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage. Base damage increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.500000 * 100]}%</font> to foes below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[50.000000]}%</font> health.

Execute gains <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">grit</font> during its attack.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Execute has a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.000000 * 100]}%</font> critical chance against foes below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[30.000000]}%</font> health.

Light attacks with your great axe give you a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">empower</font>, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.050000 * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[5.000000]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[3.000000]} stacks.)</font>

Hitting at least <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[2.000000]}</font> targets with a great axe light attack grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.200000 * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[3.000000]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

When you critical hit with a great axe, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">heal</font> yourself for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> of the damage done.

Increase armor penetration of great axe attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> against foes below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[50.000000]}%</font> health.

Whenever your attacks are blocked, gain a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.150000 * 100]}%</font> damage for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[10.000000]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[1.000000]} stacks.)</font>
Critical damage increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font>.

Great axe attacks against foes below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[30.000000]}%</font> health have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.150000 * 100]}%</font> increased <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">critical chance</font>.

Great axe attacks against foes below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[30.000000]}%</font> health <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">heal</font> you for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> of damage done.

You move <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.200000 * 100]}%</font> faster and deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.150000 * 100]}%</font> more damage when looking at a foe within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[7.000000 * 2]}m</font>.

If you hit a foe, increase <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">max spins</font>, allowing up to a total of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">7</font> spins.
Whirlwind's movement speed is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">100%</font>.

If you have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[3.000000]}</font> or more foes around you, increase base weapon damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.150000 * 100]}%</font> for each nearby target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[5.000000]} targets.)</font>

Perform a fast, spinning attack that <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">pulls</font> targets within a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">2.5m</font> radius closer to you. Deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.100000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your great axe, hits with this ability inflict taunt for {[4.000000]}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>
Extends Maelstrom's pull range by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">50%</font>.
Consumes all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">projectiles</font> while Maelstrom is active.

Maelstrom does an extra spin attack, pulling in foes and dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.100000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_slash_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage. Additionally it gains <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">grit</font> during its startup.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Increase burst damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> for each foe caught in the vortex. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[5.000000]} targets.)</font>

Allies gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}% fortify</font> while standing in your well. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor.)</font>

If you get hit while holding a great axe and are below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">50%</font> health, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[40.000000]}</font> stamina. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[20.000000]}s cooldown.)</font>
Heavy attacks with a great axe <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">pull</font> foes closer to you.

Adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">grit</font> to great axe heavy attacks. Also grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.120000 * 100]}%</font> damage reduction while <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">grit</font> is active. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

After you cause a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">pull</font>, your foe is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">rooted</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.330000]}s</font>.

When you block an attack with a great axe, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.050000 * 100]}%</font> damage for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[5.000000]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[3.000000]} stacks.)</font>

While holding a great axe, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> damage when <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">3</font> or more foes are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[4.000000]}m</font>.

While holding a great axe, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.200000 * 100]}%</font> armor when <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">3</font> or more foes are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[4.000000]}m</font>.

Great axe attacks grant a stacking <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.030000 * 100]}%</font> damage increase for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[3.000000]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[10.000000]} stacks.)</font>
